rules_text: When Laura, Would-Be Hero dies during your turn, return it to the battlefield transformed.
rules_text2:
Flying, vigilance
If damage would be dealt to you, that damage is dealt to Laura instead.
flavor_text2: [i]Being chosen by Arcadia has many benefits. For Laura, not bleeding out was the most important.[/i]
notes: Still need to figure out what's going on with this girl.
